snippet.title: Hyper Light Drifter - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
The path ahead grows darker, your life is tenuous and fleeting. Hyper Light Drifter will be released in the Spring of 2016. Preorder at http://www.heart-machine.com.

Follow us: 
Twitter: @HeartMachineZ
Instagram: @Heart_Machine
Tumblr: http://heartmachinez.tumblr.com/

Details and explanation on our release window and process:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1661802484/hyper-light-drifter/posts/1320332
